title: Phreaks Guide to Runes and Masteries for 2015 and Beyond JULY UPDATED!

embed.description: TL;DR Runes/Masteries at the very start of the video, then an in-depth look afterward. Updated July 9, 2015 -- Watch live at http://www.twitch.tv/phreakstream

body:
**A while ago there was a post made by "fruitsalad" featuring a runes guide by phreak.**

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/Mbfq2QsO-phreaks-guide-to-runes-for-season-5-2015

Phreak has made an update to this so i thought i'd share it with you all.


Peace guys, have a great day.

EDIT:
**Will post up all the pages for quick view reference, it will be in table format**

replies.body: well in defense of the great phreak maoki has really bad attack animation and running as allows you to combo your moves better balancing out passive stacks easier.

Can someone tell Phreak Maokai's passive gains stacks off spell casts alone and not attacks. He said Maokai would want to run attack speed to trigger his passive more often when it stacks off spells cast.
Yeah that was just so facepalm worthy.
